overview: Playmobil Top Agents is a classical Sixties Spy Thriller setting where the Good Guys, a.k.a. "Spy Team" fight Dr. Evil and his "Robo Gang" (the bad guys) for world domination. The Robo-Gang threatens to take over the world using orbit-launched "Chaos Capsules" … and the "Spy Team" attempts to prevent this.
title: Playmobil: Top Agents
